content: As designers we can’t let this constant desire for a good user experience stifle the creativity and innovation that is needed in web design. We can still apply the principles of good user experience design to this, it just doesn’t need to impede as much as I worry it does. I have been guilty of it in the past, spending time on research, sitemaps and wireframes because I thought that is what you have to do. So much so that there is no time to do the best bit… create.
